criterion: Provides a definition of postpartum hemorrhage
Mentions the importance of seeking medical attention if symptoms worsen or persist
Suggests the use of unproven or dangerous treatments for postpartum hemorrhage
Asks for additional context about the user's postpartum hemorrhage symptoms
Provides a clear explanation of postpartum hemorrhage prevention methods
Mentions the risk of postpartum hemorrhage in women with a history of previous hemorrhage or certain medical conditions
Uses natural language and avoids jargon or technical terms
Fails to mention the importance of proper wound care after postpartum hemorrhage
Suggests that postpartum hemorrhage is a rare condition
Asks the user about their medical history and any medications they are taking
Provides a list of common symptoms of postpartum hemorrhage
Mentions the role of healthcare providers in postpartum hemorrhage treatment and prevention
Uses a respectful and empathetic tone when discussing postpartum hemorrhage
Fails to mention the importance of follow-up care after postpartum hemorrhage treatment
Suggests that postpartum hemorrhage is a normal part of the postpartum experience
